name: RSKUIKit
summary: An addition to the UIKit framework.
description: An addition to the UIKit framework. RSKUIKit provides: a) protocols that define the roles of objects, b) the type of object that represents bounds of the view, c) the type of object that represents a frame of the view, d) the type of object that converts layout attributes of the view from `.leftToRight` user interface layout direction to the specified one, e) the type of object that represents changes to a collection of views.
